Description.Details: ''Feint'' missiles have internal chaff dispensers and go ''dumb'' and coast on inertia for a large percentage of their flight arc to fool AMS systems. They wake up and make final trajectory adjustments on just before impact. Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: Thunderbolt 5 Ammo
